asta	Forward and reverse gene mutation, mitotic recombination and gene conversion, DNA effects, chromosome aberrations, host-mediated assay
asca	HM6+
resa	Positive
rpta	EMICBACK/45734; MUTAT RES 98:319-374,1982
refa	EMICBACK/13663; MOL GEN GENET 117:197-209,1972 ; EMICBACK/20080; MUTAT RES 28:57-61,1975
END
